thank u

第1個號https://pincong.rocks/people/rtyutokgdhkj uid-27187
第2個號https://pincong.rocks/people/Acadvb  uid-27213

第4個號https://pincong.rocks/people/Fury  uid-27310

@荆棘之心  刪除帳戶(Acadvb rtyutokgdhkj  Fury)

    不是管理有问题，是机制如此。而且你发的内容在上面已经有人发出来了。




第1個號, 直接折叠, 没回复, 不加声望    管理一定有问题(没理由就折叠),
因為第1個號密碼没記, 註冊第2個號

第2個號, 有人回复:"???"    可能不懂Enlglish, 点击回复 显示声望不足没法回复
註冊第3個號加翻譯

第3個號, 加中文翻譯了, 没回复, 不加声望

第4個號, I have seen the source code, if 'reputation' less or equal than 0 there is no way to gain reputation  except the admin managed. That's why this account created.

You can see name of 第1個號 第2個號 is random, and so is their password (lost when registered).

I don't have Chinese input tool in my machine. That's why I don't want to use Chinese. (copy-paste big(大)law(法)hao)

I don't want to argue more with admin. Now you can delete my first, second and this account to protect my information.
刪除帳戶(Acadvb rtyutokgdhkj  Fury)
